body.name: Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin, Fast-Absorbing, Soothing Lightweight Gel Cream Face Moisturizer with Prebiotic Oat & Feverfew, Fragrance-Free, 0.5 oz
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: $4.51 delivery February 20 - 22. Order within 7 hrs 33 mins.
features: 0.5-ounce container of Aveeno Calm + Restore Fragrance-Free Oat Gel Facial Moisturizer for sensitive skin with Prebiotic Oat and calming feverfew, instantly soothes and replenishes skin's moisture barrier

Aveeno Calm + Restore designed for sensitive skin with prebiotic oat goes beyond soothing to strengthen skin's moisture barrier. The hydrating daily facial moisturizer provides 24-hour moisture that leaves skin comfortable all day long

The lightweight, fast-absorbing formula contains prebiotic oat and feverfew, which effectively helps calm irritated, dry skin. 97% noted skin feels less irritated, more tolerant and comfortable all day

Ideal for sensitive skincare, the gentle daily face moisturizer is fragrance-free, paraben-free, alcohol-free, dye-free, phthalate-free, tested on sensitive skin and it's non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores

From a dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, Aveeno Calm + Restore Fragrance-Free Oat Gel Moisturizer instantly soothes and hydrates sensitive skin, making it a perfect addition to your daily skincare routine
body.description: Hydrate your sensitive, irritated, dry skin with Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Facial Moisturizer. Tested to be gentle on sensitive skin, the gentle oat gel moisturizer instantly soothes and replenishes skin’s moisture barrier. Aveeno Calm + Restore designed for sensitive skin with prebiotic oat goes beyond soothing to strengthen skin's moisture barrier. The lightweight hydrating gel cream continues to moisturize for 24 hours so even sensitive skin feels comfortable all day. Prebiotic oat helps soothe dryness and nourishes skin's natural moisture barrier while feverfew calms irritated skin and 97% noted skin feels less irritated, more tolerant and comfortable all day. The fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula is free of fragrances, parabens, alcohol, dyes and phthalates and leaves skin feeling soft and supple. Twice daily, massage the gel moisturizer directly onto face using an upward and outward motion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this face lotion a lot
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive and very dry skin - this moisturizer works well for me moisturizing without making my face feel greasy and it doesn't make my skin break out. Absorbs well into my skin and feels light once on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin absolutely adores the Aveeno triple oat line.
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I didn't like is the fact that it was a tiny little container, but quality costs I guess

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sits on top of the skin
reviews.reviewText: Didn't get absorbed into the skin. Gentle product good for sensitive skin. Even for Aveeno was very pricy for the tiny jar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice and works well
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a facial moisturizer and I know Aveeno is typically good for sensitive skin. This arrived promptly and works well. I also like the smell, it's slightly oaty and sweet but not strong.I didn't realize the container was this small but that's because I'm bad at estimating. It was exactly the size described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Trial size and not sealed! Low price was too good to be true.
reviews.reviewText: I thought I was getting a great deal, but it was too good to be true. This whole thing seemed sort of fishy... the containers are trial size and had big black marks across the UPC codes on the bottom. They also were not sealed in anyway. Lastly the return address sender name was from Captain Mouse... the whole thing just seemed off to me. Having said all that this particular moisturizer is really great for sensitive skin that breaks out easily and also for skin that isn't super dry. Just don't buy it from this seller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pictures and pricing make this seem like a normal sized moisturizer but it’s actually extremely small. Almost to the point it doesn’t make sense to even produce something this small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizer I have fould for my sensative skin. My dermatologist recommended it.
This is a trial size product!
reviews.reviewText: While the actual product maybe alright, the size is actually a trial size which costs about the same as full size. Hence feeling cheated. The photos shown in the description are of the actual size product.
